title: Can you seriously format the dates for Australians?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/073272292781f051c640e3209a278332.png

It takes five minutes to swap that around to 11/12 and then fix it, as we will be getting him on 12/12.

I just don't get it.

Edit: Why was this moved to gameplay and strategy? Lol.
